flawed_nl_solution:
The house is 2300 sq ft and we know the non-bedroom sections take up 1000 sq ft, so that leaves 2300-1000 = <<2300-1000=1030>>1030 sq ft for the bedrooms/bathrooms
So together the bedrooms are x + 0.25x = 1.25x in size.
So x = 1030 / 1.25 = <<1030/1.25=824>>824 sq ft
#### 824

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1300, not 1030. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
